title: Looking to start a ranked 5s Team Silver
body:
Hello I'm trying to find a ranked 5's team to play with frequently, all the other teams I've joined just split up so if you're just looking to play right now and don't actually want to form a team please do not reply to this post or add me.

So for those who are interested please fill out the following:

1. IGN
2. Rank
3. Preferred role
4. Top 5 choice champions
5. Skype, Curse, or Team Speak


If you have any questions or additional information add me on League DGV
